description:
##This package disables the Adobe Flash Player Updater. (Updates will be installed only by Chocolatey.)

##Uninstalling the package will re-enable Adobe Flash Player Updater.

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/flashplayerplugin-disable-updates-winconfig/readme.md)**
summary: This package disables Adobe Flash Player Updater.
author: bcurran3
